text: Special Equipment: toothpicks
Special equipment: One 16-cookie madeleine pan with 3x2" molds

Special equipment: parchment paper; a 2 1/2-inch round cookie cutter; a piping tip with a 1/4-inch plain round opening (if making cookies into ornaments); pastry bags or several small heavy-duty sealable plastic bags (optional)
Special equipment: 1 pound dried beans, 10-inch tart pan
Special equipment: 2 muffin tins, each with 12 (1/2-cup) muffin cups
Special equipment: slow cooker
Special equipment: 1 doughnut cutter, or 2 concentric cutters; candy thermometer
Equipment: Candy thermometer; silicone baking mat
Special equipment: a pastry or bench scraper
Special equipment: a large pastry bag fitted with a 1/2-inch plain tip
Special equipment: 1 1/2-to-2-inch wide by 2-inch deep ring mold and 4-inch wooden skewers
Special equipment: Butcher's twine, 3 to 4 large pieces cheesecloth (about 2 by 2 feet)
Special equipment: 48 (8-inch) wooden skewers soaked in water 1 hour
Special equipment: a melon-ball cutter
Special equipment: a 6- by 4-inch piece of cheesecloth; kitchen string
Special equipment: a pizza stone; parchment paper; a baking peel or rimless baking sheet
Special equipment: large heavy bottomed ovenproof skillet
Special equipment: a muffin pan with 1/2-cup muffin cups
Special equipment: A large stainless steel or copper bowl, plus a larger bowl for holding (optional)
Special equipment: 12- by 18-inch sheet or jelly roll pan, 2 featherweight pastry bags with couplers, #1 and #101 decorating tips
Equipment: 8 (1/3-cup) ice pop molds and 8 wooden sticks
Special Equipment: a candy thermometer
Special equipment: 8 x 8 x 2-inch nonstick metal baking pan
Special equipment: a deep-fat thermometer
Special equipment: a 9 1/2-inch (24-cm) springform pan
Special equipment: 2 (12-inch) ovenproof heavy skillets
Special equipment: Potato ricer
Special equipment: A charcoal or wood-fired grill or smoker; a meat injector
Special equipment: a pastry or bench scraper; a 9-inch fluted brioche mold (3 1/2 inches deep)
Special equipment: a watercolor paintbrush
Special equipment: Fine-mesh grill basket or all-metal strainer
Special equipment: Ovenproof 10-inch-diameter skillet with 2 1/2-inch-high sides
